name: VR Exoplanets V1.0
description:
For ANDROID :

It's a complete Immersion in VR space .

This Android application is a simulation through Space with VR Glasses , you will discover somes planets , exoplanets , asteroids and stars.

With your gear VR glasses button , you can fly to discover planets or stop in space and changing direction by turning your head .

For WINDOWS :

It's a Desktop application.

Just Download the file "EXOPLANETS.RAR" , decompress it , and click on the "Exoplanets.exe" to execute the application , to move forward AND NAVIGATE IN SPACE click on "w" key , backward :"S",Left "A",Right "D".

Thanks
